PSCT.Base: You can send this card from your hand or field to the GY; place 1 "Divine Domain Baatistina" from your Deck, face-up in your Field Zone. If a face-up "Tistina" Spell/Trap(s) you control is destroyed by an opponent's card effect, while this card is in your GY (except during the Damage Step): You can banish this card; Special Summon 1 LIGHT "Tistina" monster from your hand, Deck, or GY. You can only use each effect of "Fallen of the Tistina" once per turn.
